params.price: The presale token price in 18 decimals, because our calculations returns a value in 36 decimals and to get returning value in 18 decimals we divide by round price

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.priceFeedData: Contains the price feed of the tokens, tolerance and the normalization factor

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.customPrices: The customPrice prices if any for the tokens
params.round: The round in which you want to update

params.price: The price of the round in 18 decimals
params.round: The Round that will be updated

allowedTokens(uint32,address).notice: mapping gives us access info of the token in a given round

rounds(uint32).notice: mapping gives Round Data of each round

setTokenPriceFeed(address[],(address,uin.notice: Sets token price feeds and normalization factors

tokenData(address).notice: Gives us onchain price oracle address of the token

updateAllowedTokens(uint32,address[],boo.notice: Updates the access of tokens in a given round
